description: In four steps and five ingredients, youâ€™ll have a hearty and easy beef stroganoff on the dinner table. A tasty recipe for weeknight meal.
name: Continental's Simple Beef Stroganoff Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Continental Recipe base beef stroganoff

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a large frying pan and brown 500g lean beef strips. Add 1 large sliced onion and 1 cup sliced mushrooms, cook until tender.
Combine Continental Recipe Base Beef Stroganoff and 1 1/4 cups (310mL) water; add to pan and stir until boiling. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until beef is tender, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat and stir through 2 tablespoons (40g) sour cream.
Garnish with parsley and serve with rice and green beans.
